ftp.user_not_found_desc: Click the button below to create the first one

dashboard.title: Servidor web
dashboard.empty_piechart_label: No data to create the graph

docs.path-and-virtual-host-rules: If you want to create an URL path rule, the name field must start with a '/'. If you need to create a virtual host name rule, then the name field must match a virtual host name
docs.MaxExecutionTime: This sets the maximum time in seconds a script is allowed to run before it is terminated by the parser.
docs.MemoryLimit: This sets the maximum amount of memory in bytes that a script is allowed to allocate, this value must be larger than the 'Maximum post size'.
docs.PostMaxSize: Sets max size of post data allowed. This setting also affects file upload. To upload large files, this value must be larger than 'Upload maximum file size'.
docs.UploadMaxFilesize: The maximum size of an uploaded file, this value must be smaller than the 'Maximum post size'.

validation.valid_fqdn: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.valid_fqdn_already_used: The virtual host name is already used
validation.key_already_exists: A virtual host with the same name already exists
validation.valid_notEmpty: This field can not be empty
validation.hostname_key_exists: The Virtual host names (FQDN) is already used
validation.valid_hostname_fqdn_1_922337203685477580: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.ValidFromCIDR_validator: Must be a valid CIDR like '10.10.10.0/16', one item per line
validation.Invalid_Target: Must be a valid URL like 'http://domain.com'
validation.user_already_exists: Já existe uma conta com o mesmo nome
validation.valid_username: First character must be a letter, than only lower letters, numbers and symbols like '-' and '_'

proxypass.AcceptInvalidCertificateFromTarget: Accept invalid SSL certificate from target
proxypass.CreateHostRecords: Create a record under "DNS > Server alias" page for each virtual host name

proxypass.CIDR_Comma_Sperated_List: Empty or a CIDR comma separated list

proxypass.automatic_HostRecord_creation: An host name alias is added to System > Dashboard > Hostname
